content.query:
-- creating database

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_db;

USE nyc_taxi_db;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

    -- Checking data types infered by Synapse

    EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) AS [result]'

-- Reading data with correct data type

SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedldemo.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
)
AS [RESULT];


SELECT NAME, COLLATION_NAME FROM sys.databases;
